text: function allows parse worldclim version 2.1 future climatic files Central America. function wrapper future_worldclim2 function itsdm package.

title: Download future climate data for Central America — ca_future_worldclim
code: ca_future_worldclim(var, res, gcm, ssp, interval, path, return_stack = TRUE)

title: Download future climate data for Central America — ca_future_worldclim
text: var (character) option variable download. one tmin, tmax, prec, bioc. default tmin. res (numeric) option resolution image download. one 0.5, 2.5, 5, 10. default 10. gcm (character) option global climate models. Check https://www.worldclim.org available GCM. ssp (character) option Shared Socio-economic Pathways. one "ssp126", "ssp245", "ssp370", "ssp585". default "ssp585". interval (character) option time interval. one "2021-2040", "2041-2060", "2061-2080", "2081-2100". default "2021-2040". path (character) path save downloaded imagery. NULL, use current working directory. default NULL. return_stack (logical) TRUE, stack imagery together return. area large resolution high, better stack . default TRUE.

title: Download future climate data for Central America — ca_future_worldclim
text: return_stack TRUE, images returned stars. Otherwise, nothing return, user receive message images .
